name: Robin Lloyd no Bouken
description:
Robin Lloyd is a young detective who must journey to various locations through the World to solve crazy over-the-top kidnapping / extortion mysteries. The game is an action adventure game in which the player have to talk to different characters (like Butler the dog, Alicea Garfield, Elice Runbart, Ryile Rockwood, etc) and use different objects to advance in the game and defeat Colonel Doil evil plans.

The game is designed with cartoon 3d graphics and the player have to explore and examine each location and characters carefully to find objects that allow him to advance further in the game. The game also features action sequences.

Manufacturer's description:

In London, a mysterious and bizarre incidents happened. In order to solve these mysteries, a private detective Robin Lloyd was hires!

Features:
Third person perspective.
3D graphics
Cartoon graphics
Adventure & Fantasy themes.
